meanings.definition: A person who provides a connection or communication between groups or individuals.
meanings.sent1: The linkmen at the event ensured smooth communication between the guests and the organizers.
meanings.sent2: The linkmen in the company play a crucial role in maintaining relationships with clients.
meanings.sent3: The linkmen decided to have a race to see who could connect two people the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the web of social interactions, he was the linkmen who tied everyone together.
meanings.sent5: The linkmen wore bright hats to stand out and be easily recognizable in the crowd.
